title: Red Jersey Favorites? UAE Emirates Brings Yates, Almeida, McNulty ‘Triple Threat’ to Vuelta a España
content:
No Pogačar or Ayuso for season dominators, but heavyweight team including a fleet of top climbers and Mexican prodigy Del Toro will line out as favorites.

Read the full article at Red Jersey Favorites? UAE Emirates Brings Yates, Almeida, McNulty ‘Triple Threat’ to Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
